name: Falling Stars - Quick Game Idea
description:
If you want to take a look at other projects I made take a look at my Itch account and if you are interested in my Portfolio take a look here: https://mystical-orb-inc.justinschothuis.repl.co/portfoliojcs.html

Background Music: https://www.free-stock-music.com/fsm-team-escp-space-floating.html

This is a simple game I made in about 1 hour to challenge myself, its a fairly simple game.

How to play:
WASD: Movement
Space: Shoot
Esc: Quit
R: Restart

Collect the stars, Avoid the asteroids.
